creator: PIXELCUBE STUDIOS INC.
descriptionHtml:
Played 100,000+ times each day! Only 1% of players get $10 million within 3 minutes - can you?!

★ NO annoying forced video ads bothering you
★ Completely optional competitive or casual co-op multiplayer
★ Unfolding gameplay where you unlock and discover new features
★ 300+ unique hand drawn cookies including pizza cookies (yes, you read that right)
★ 1,000+ super cool upgrades to give you amazingly cool boosts
★ Very active community and always listening to your feedback about cool new things to add

Come and check out the best incremental (clicker) game you’ve ever played! Go on an adventure to build your massive cookie empire and earn millions and billions of cookies creating your tycoon business!

Enjoy the best idle cookie simulator offline or online with co-op and competitive multiplayer with teams. If that’s not your thing, this is one of the best offline games around!

There are no ads (video) that you’re forced to watch. All video ads are opt-in only. It’s rare to find an ad free idle game but we promise we won’t annoy you with ads!

Endless gameplay that will make sure you’re never bored. There are always new upgrades, boosts, prestige and items to collect. You’ll experience a roller coaster of upgrades with hundreds of unique buffs. No internet connection required and lots of auto clickers that will help you on your adventure.

Instead of merge or clicking gameplay, Cookie Inc. - Idle Tycoon Games lets you swipe to collect cookies. No strain on your finger and it’s much more relaxing. Play it casual and chill or play hardcore and be competitive with your team and leagues. The idle gameplay works like an automatic auto clicker so you’re always making progress.

Enjoy idle inc style games? This is the one for you! The best idle simulator and the best idle tycoon game. No forced video ads, optional multiplayer with teams, tons of upgrades, super easy to use and simple to learn interface, secrets to discover, optional weekly seasons and leagues with loot, constant updates with new content - what’s not to love!

Bake cookies and farm resources to get super rich! Auto tappers and autoclickers will help you on your epic cookie quest. Level up many times with unique prestige gameplay that unlocks new upgrades each time you prestige. Create your dream bakery with the most realistic simulator that involves cookies (yes, that’s a real category). You will have to manage your cookie business and spend cookies where it matters to get the best upgrades.

Become a cookie capitalist and make it rain billions of cookies. Let the game idle and continue earning cookies when you’re offline. Manage and create your dream bakery with this addicting idle game. Baking has never been so fun! Start your idle journey and play through the cookie saga and uncover the secrets of the Cookieverse.

Instead of your usual cooking games, Cookie Inc. - Idle Tycoon Games has unique clicker gameplay to always keep it fun and easy. Become a collector and mine millions of cookies. Your idle empire has never been so close! Run your own bakery and jam out to some super catchy music while you’re at it.

If you love incremental (clicker) or idle games, we sure you'll love ours! :)

PIXELCUBE STUDIOS
420 Main Street East
Suite #558
Milton, Ontario, L9T 5G3

creator: PIXELCUBE STUDIOS
descriptionHtml:
Played 100,000+ times each day! Only 1% of players get $10 million within 3 minutes - can you?!

★ NO annoying forced video ads bothering you
★ Completely optional competitive or casual co-op multiplayer
★ Unfolding gameplay where you unlock and discover new features
★ 300+ unique hand drawn cookies including pizza cookies (yes, you read that right)
★ 1,000+ super cool upgrades to give you amazingly cool boosts
★ Very active community and always listening to your feedback about cool new things to add

Come and check out the best incremental (clicker) game you’ve ever played! Go on an adventure to build your massive cookie empire and earn millions and billions of cookies creating your tycoon business!

Enjoy the best idle cookie simulator offline or online with co-op and competitive multiplayer with teams. If that’s not your thing, this is one of the best offline games around!

There are no ads (video) that you’re forced to watch. All video ads are opt-in only. It’s rare to find an ad free idle game but we promise we won’t annoy you with ads!

Endless gameplay that will make sure you’re never bored. There are always new upgrades, boosts, prestige and items to collect. You’ll experience a roller coaster of upgrades with hundreds of unique buffs. No internet connection required and lots of auto clickers that will help you on your adventure.

Instead of merge or clicking gameplay, Cookie Inc. - Idle Tycoon Games lets you swipe to collect cookies. No strain on your finger and it’s much more relaxing. Play it casual and chill or play hardcore and be competitive with your team and leagues. The idle gameplay works like an automatic auto clicker so you’re always making progress.

Enjoy idle inc style games? This is the one for you! The best idle simulator and the best idle tycoon game. No forced video ads, optional multiplayer with teams, tons of upgrades, super easy to use and simple to learn interface, secrets to discover, optional weekly seasons and leagues with loot, constant updates with new content - what’s not to love!

Bake cookies and farm resources to get super rich! Auto tappers and autoclickers will help you on your epic cookie quest. Level up many times with unique prestige gameplay that unlocks new upgrades each time you prestige. Create your dream bakery with the most realistic simulator that involves cookies (yes, that’s a real category). You will have to manage your cookie business and spend cookies where it matters to get the best upgrades.

Become a cookie capitalist and make it rain billions of cookies. Let the game idle and continue earning cookies when you’re offline. Manage and create your dream bakery with this addicting idle game. Baking has never been so fun! Start your idle journey and play through the cookie saga and uncover the secrets of the Cookieverse.

Instead of your usual cooking games, Cookie Inc. - Idle Tycoon Games has unique clicker gameplay to always keep it fun and easy. Become a collector and mine millions of cookies. Your idle empire has never been so close! Run your own bakery and jam out to some super catchy music while you’re at it.

If you love incremental (clicker) or idle games, we sure you'll love ours! :)
descriptionShort: #1 idle game - use auto clickers to get rich with your cookie tycoon empire!

appDetails.developerAddress:
PIXELCUBE STUDIOS
420 Main Street East
Suite #558
Milton, Ontario, L9T 5G3
appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Update #111: Welcome cookie collectors to a MASSIVE update! This one has been cooking in the Oven for a while and I’m so happy to finally share it with all of you! Lots and lots of changes throughout the game to shake things up and streamline your cookie collecting. This is the FIRST TIME ever that I couldn’t fit all changes in the update notes here - see full notes in-game or at discord.gg/PIXELCUBE. Until next time, keep collecting! :) -Naveen

creator: PIXELCUBE STUDIOS
descriptionHtml:
Played 100,000+ times each day! Only 1% of players get $10 million within 3 minutes - can you?!

★ NO annoying forced video ads bothering you
★ Completely optional competitive or casual co-op multiplayer
★ Unfolding gameplay where you unlock and discover new features
★ 300+ unique hand drawn cookies including pizza cookies (yes, you read that right)
★ 1,000+ super cool upgrades to give you amazingly cool boosts
★ Very active community and always listening to your feedback about cool new things to add

Come and check out the best incremental (clicker) game you’ve ever played! Go on an adventure to build your massive cookie empire and earn millions and billions of cookies creating your tycoon business!

Enjoy the best idle cookie simulator offline or online with co-op and competitive multiplayer with teams. If that’s not your thing, this is one of the best offline games around!

There are no ads (video) that you’re forced to watch. All video ads are opt-in only. It’s rare to find an ad free idle game but we promise we won’t annoy you with ads!

Endless gameplay that will make sure you’re never bored. There are always new upgrades, boosts, prestige and items to collect. You’ll experience a roller coaster of upgrades with hundreds of unique buffs. No internet connection required and lots of auto clickers that will help you on your adventure.

Instead of merge or clicking gameplay, Cookie Inc. - Idle Tycoon Games lets you swipe to collect cookies. No strain on your finger and it’s much more relaxing. Play it casual and chill or play hardcore and be competitive with your team and leagues. The idle gameplay works like an automatic auto clicker so you’re always making progress.

Enjoy idle inc style games? This is the one for you! The best idle simulator and the best idle tycoon game. No forced video ads, optional multiplayer with teams, tons of upgrades, super easy to use and simple to learn interface, secrets to discover, optional weekly seasons and leagues with loot, constant updates with new content - what’s not to love!

Bake cookies and farm resources to get super rich! Auto tappers and autoclickers will help you on your epic cookie quest. Level up many times with unique prestige gameplay that unlocks new upgrades each time you prestige. Create your dream bakery with the most realistic simulator that involves cookies (yes, that’s a real category). You will have to manage your cookie business and spend cookies where it matters to get the best upgrades.

Become a cookie capitalist and make it rain billions of cookies. Let the game idle and continue earning cookies when you’re offline. Manage and create your dream bakery with this addicting idle game. Baking has never been so fun! Start your idle journey and play through the cookie saga and uncover the secrets of the Cookieverse.

Instead of your usual cooking games, Cookie Inc. - Idle Tycoon Games has unique clicker gameplay to always keep it fun and easy. Become a collector and mine millions of cookies. Your idle empire has never been so close! Run your own bakery and jam out to some super catchy music while you’re at it.

If you love incremental (clicker) or idle games, we sure you'll love ours! :)

creator: PIXELCUBE STUDIOS
descriptionHtml:
Grow your cookie empire and become the richest cookie owner in history (or not, it's totally up to you) ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

★ NO VIDEO ADS!
You don't need another game shoving ads in your face - all video ads are optional and you choose when to watch them. We hate forced ads too!

★ Competitive or casual co-op multiplayer!
Want to play with friends? What about compete to become the best cookie collector? All multiplayer features are completely optional. Play offline and solo if that's your thing.

★ Unlocks and upgrades!
You'll always be making progress and unlocking new features. It's the kind of game you can play for years (if you want) and always have something new to check out!

★ True idle gameplay!
Featuring a built-in idle feature so you don't need to be playing the game 24/7. We know you have a life outside of getting cookies all day!

★ Super active community!
Every single review gets read and replied to. In-game teams feature. Very active Discord community. Early access beta updates are also available! We've got it all :D

And now the boring stuff nobody actually reads: we've spent years making the absolute best idle clicker game available. With over 100+ real updates (not those "bug fix" ones) and a very active player base, we're always working on the next big thing and creating new features and content for you to enjoy.

The perfect game to relax and enjoy while you're chilling - or you can play more actively if that's your style. It's totally up to you!

★ NO annoying forced video ads bothering you
★ Completely optional competitive or casual co-op multiplayer
★ Unfolding gameplay where you unlock and discover new features
★ 300+ unique hand drawn cookies including pizza cookies (yes, you read that right)
★ 1,000+ super cool upgrades to give you amazingly cool boosts
★ Very active community and always listening to your feedback about cool new things to add

Come and check out the best incremental (clicker) game you’ve ever played! Go on an adventure to build your massive cookie empire and earn millions and billions of cookies creating your tycoon business!

Enjoy the best idle cookie simulator offline or online with co-op and competitive multiplayer with teams. If that’s not your thing, this is one of the best offline games around!

There are no ads (video) that you’re forced to watch. All video ads are opt-in only. It’s rare to find an ad free idle game but we promise we won’t annoy you with ads!

Endless gameplay that will make sure you’re never bored. There are always new upgrades, boosts, prestige and items to collect. You’ll experience a roller coaster of upgrades with hundreds of unique buffs. No internet connection required and lots of auto clickers that will help you on your adventure.

Instead of merge or clicking gameplay, Cookie Inc. - Idle Tycoon Games lets you swipe to collect cookies. No strain on your finger and it’s much more relaxing. Play it casual and chill or play hardcore and be competitive with your team and leagues. The idle gameplay works like an automatic auto clicker so you’re always making progress.

Enjoy idle inc style games? This is the one for you! The best idle simulator and the best idle tycoon game. No forced video ads, optional multiplayer with teams, tons of upgrades, super easy to use and simple to learn interface, secrets to discover, optional weekly seasons and leagues with loot, constant updates with new content - what’s not to love!

Bake cookies and farm resources to get super rich! Auto tappers and autoclickers will help you on your epic cookie quest. Level up many times with unique prestige gameplay that unlocks new upgrades each time you prestige. Create your dream bakery with the most realistic simulator that involves cookies (yes, that’s a real category). You will have to manage your cookie business and spend cookies where it matters to get the best upgrades.

Become a cookie capitalist and make it rain billions of cookies. Let the game idle and continue earning cookies when you’re offline. Manage and create your dream bakery with this addicting idle game. Baking has never been so fun! Start your idle journey and play through the cookie saga and uncover the secrets of the Cookieverse.

Instead of your usual cooking games, Cookie Inc. - Idle Tycoon Games has unique clicker gameplay to always keep it fun and easy. Become a collector and mine millions of cookies. Your idle empire has never been so close! Run your own bakery and jam out to some super catchy music while you’re at it.

If you love incremental (clicker) or idle games, we sure you'll love ours! :)
